data.Name: ZelCore
data.Description: ZelCore is an encrypted multi-asset wallet with both lightweight and full node capability. ZelCore is also the Zelcash platform for future capabilities including a Dex, zelNodes, and other dAPPs.

data.Name: Swing Wallet
data.Description: Swing wallet is a Full Node wallet with z-address capability for privacy features. Requires download and syncing of the full blockchain and proving keys.

data.Name: Web Wallet
data.Description: Web Wallet is the easiest wallet available. No installation needed. Just go ahead to My.Zel.Cash and login/create a wallet with your secret phrase. Web Wallet also offers the option to use your address by importing your private key or by importing the whole wallet.dat file.

data.Name: ZelGen
data.Description: ZelGen and ZelRetrieve allows you to create offline wallets easily. Create your own unique transparent address that starts with your desired characters! Available for Windows and Linux.
